description: Rainforest trail passing a massive banyan tree and bamboo forest to Waimoku Falls.
Descent into the crater floor of HaleakalƒÅ; stark, moon-like volcanic landscape.
Steep ridge hike offering panoramic ocean and valley views; slippery when wet.
Short, easy walk to accessible waterfalls and swimming holes; very crowded.
Rugged switchback trail climbing the windmills; hot and exposed.
permit_notes: Bring lots of water; very hot.

description: Strenuous trail connecting Maunalei Arboretum to the coast via Kapalua.
Easy paved and boardwalk path along the jagged coast and bays.
permit_notes: Easy parking at various beach lots.

description: Paved walk to view the iconic green needle rock formation.
